channel.title: Need a coder for a RSPS
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Am hiring a coder to create me a RSPS.
Am looking to run a RSPS one of which I will be aiming to make a great success, in order to achieve my goals I am going to need an exceptional coder.
I'll be wanting to see evidence of your past work.
This will obviously be a full time commitment, I'll be looking to turning this into a successful server for the joy and the financial gain.
I have a forum/graphic designer awaiting.
I'll be paying for the Dedi , all advertisement fee's and anything else that will need to be paid for.
I understand there's a lot of RSPS'S already out there which is why Iv'e set a budget of $1,000 to start this project off.
Am only looking for an exceptional coder who will be dedicated to the project and someone I will hopefully be able to build a good working relationship with.
We will discuss which source will be best in private as well as payment.
For more information pm me.
Thanks,
Tom.

item.title: Need a coder for a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Tom_RSPS Tom RSPS
